attributes.action: Children should go back to school during the summer holidays this year.
attributes.additional_details:
Children need their education to grow their minds and get jobs in the future.
They are missing so much because of this virus.
Children need to socialize with their peers to keep healthy physically and mentally as well.
attributes.background:
Children are missing their education because of the Coronavirus.
Therefore if the virus disappears in the summer, then school should be reopened and children should carry on learning.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/305213

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
